I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer to you. I'll sell it to you for $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your operations, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say? 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer
